Class DotInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • DotInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DotInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    The class DotInfo is a simple helper class to store the initial color and state (captured or not) at the dot position (x,y)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
